infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app needs access to photo library to select profile pictures.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app needs access to camera to take profile pictures.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app needs access to your location to track your steps.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: This app needs access to your location to track your steps in the background.

plugins.photosPermission: The app accesses your photos to let you share them.
plugins.cameraPermission: The app accesses your camera to let you take photos.

plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to use your location to track steps in the background.
plugins.locationAlwaysPermission: Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to use your location to track steps in the background.
plugins.locationWhenInUsePermission: Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to use your location to track steps.
